body.name: DeerValley 17.72" High Toilets Two-Piece Toilet, 12” Rough in Dual Flush 1/1.6 GPF and MaP 1000g, ADA Chair Height Toilet Bowl With Soft Close Seat for elderly, White DV-2F0079
features: 【Comfortable ADA Height Toilet】 This ADA toilet measures 26.77 x 16.54 x 32.28 inches with a seat height of 17.32inches, making it easy to use for those who have difficulty getting up from a low toilet, making it ideal for seniors, people with disabilities, and tall people.

【Powerful & Clog-Free】 Great maximum performance flush score of 1000 grams, siphon dual-flush, fully-glazed 2" trapway, 1.6 gallons of water for a full flush and 1.1 gallon of water for a light flush. Provides ample flushing power to ensure a clean, clog-free, leak-free, water-saving toilet.
【Quiet-Close Seat】The toilets for bathrooms features a soft-closing quick release seat design that closes gently and quietly, reducing the noise of nighttime toilet visits.

【High Quality Two-Piece Toilet】 This toilet bowl is high temperature fired, porcelainised with low glaze absorption, suitable for 12 inch rough-in installation and comes with a left-handed lever. Package includes toilet, soft close toilet lid, pre-installed flush valve, premium wax ring, floor bolts and installation instructions.

【12 Months Warranty】 We are committed to providing our customers with quality bathroom products and a great shopping experience. If you are not satisfied with our products or encounter any problem, please feel free to send us an email through the platform and we will solve it for you in time.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Specifications Material: Ceramic Flush Type: Dual Flush 1.1/1.6GPF Bowl Shape: U Shape Dimensions: 26.77 x32.28 x16.54 inches Seat Height: 17.72 inches

12" Rough in Dual Flush Two Piece Toilet Package Includes - 1 x Two Piece Toilet - 1 x Soft-Close Toilet Seat - 1 x Wax Ring & Bolt Kit - 1 x Toilet Seat Installation Kit - 1 x Installation Instruction

Removable Seat Quickly removes at the touch of a button and closes gently and quietly to reduce noise during nighttime toileting. Water Saving Dual Flush 1.1Gpf and 1.6Gpf two flushing gears can be selected to ensure that the flushing performance at the same time, more water-saving.

Comfortable Chair Height With a seat height of 17.72 inches, it's easy to use for those who have trouble getting up from low toilets, making it ideal for seniors, people with disabilities, and taller people.
Product Information Model Number DV-2F0079 Color White Toilet Material Ceramic Toilet Seat Material High Quality PP Performance Description MaP score of 1000

What is the rough in? The rough-in is 12 inches. What is the seat height? The seat height is ADA-compliant, which is a comfortable and accessible height. What is the bowl shape? It’s oblong. Is the seat soft closing? Yes, our seat is equipped with a soft-closing feature and quick-release functionality. Is the flush powerful? Yes, our toilet boasts a 1.6 GPF flush with a MaP rating of 1000g, combining a quiet operation with powerful flushing capability for your daily needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A nice buy and easy installation.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This was the easiest toilet installation for us. I loved that this DeerValley toilet was so affordable and it came with everything we needed. The only challenge was taking off the old toilet. We selected this toilet not only because of its affordability but also because the size. this is a nice size toilet for me and my husband who is 6’5. it’s solid, sturdy and sits at a good height for someone larger like my husband. shipping was also pretty fast and everything was neatly packaged and intact inside the box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy, heavy porcelain toilet. Seat and lid are a cheap plastic but that is easily changed for something that matches the bathroom.Great toilet at a good value

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An excellent product
reviews.reviewText: An excellent product. Deer Valley is a very good company to deal with. Their customer service is one of the best.You can’t go wrong with these people or their products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I should have bought this toilet a long time ago!
reviews.reviewText: So far so good. My 70 year old wife can now get up from this toilet with very little effort. It appears to be able to flush without any problems and I believe our next water utility bill will reflect the improved efficiency of this technology. I am a little confused as to why you sent a variety of tank attachment bolts, washers, and nuts. Your directions did not show what the best combination of bolts, washers, and nuts were preferred.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 10" rough in with great features
reviews.reviewText: Great packing and quick shipping. When needing a 10" rough in, it's pretty slim pickings and usually not in stock a local stores. If you do find one, it has limited features. Often without a seat. Then it's like...good luck finding just the right seat to perfectly fit the bowl. This toilet is good looking and has all the features I was looking for....and the only toilet that did at a decent price. Soft close seat, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install.. works great .. delivered late that’s all
